# coder users show

Show a single user. Use 'me' to indicate the currently authenticated user.

## Usage

```console
coder users show <username|user_id|'me'> [flags]
```

## Examples

```console
  $ coder users show me
```

## Flags

### --output, -o

Output format. Available formats: table, json
<br/>
| | |
| --- | --- |
| Default | <code>table</code> |
